titles.title: We Are More Than Conquerors Through Him That Loved Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are more than conquerors through Him that loved us.
If God be for us, who can be against us? (2x.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is now therefore no condemnation (3x.)
To those in Christ Jesus, who can be against us? (2x.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who can separate us from the love of Jesus? (3x.)
If God be for us, who can be against us? (2x.)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ther is no man that can take me from His hand. (3x.)
If God be for us, who can be against us? (2x.)
